p: This century has recorded an increase in emerging zoonotic CoVs. Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) emerged in 2002, Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) in 2012, swine acute diarrhea syndrome coronavirus (SADS-CoV) in 2016, and most recently, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in 2019 [ 4]. Notably, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 infect humans, while SADS-CoV causes disease only in pigs [ 5, 6].
